pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bayesian Estimation Supersedes the t-Test // An alternative to t-tests, producing posterior estimates for group means and standard deviations and their differences and effect sizes. It implements the method of Kruschke (2013) Bayesian estimation supersedes the t test. Journal of Experimental Psychology: General, 142(2):573-603 doi: 10.1037/a0029146.
